content: I am a Robotics PhD student advised by Dr.Panagiotis Tsiotras in the Institute of Robotics and Intelligent Machines (IRIM) (http://www.robotics.gatech.edu/) at Georgia Tech. I am currently working on intelligent exploration techniques for sampling-based motion planning. My research area lies at the exciting intersection of A.I and heuristics, Machine learning and optimal-control theory. I graduated from IIT-Madras in 2017 with a Bachelor’s and Master’s degree in Engineering Design, where I worked with Dr.Shankar Ram C S (https://ed.iitm.ac.in/~shankarram/).
